item.title: Mergesort
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction Yesterday I was talking with a teammate about algorithms, and how some people had troubles with them, so I will create this new post to explain how mergesort works. An algorithm to order arrays/lists in O(n*log n) Big O Complexity In case you have not heard about big O notation. I will do a brief resume about it. We usually talk about two types of complexity, space and time. And by default if it is not specified, usually everyone is talking about time.
